document_data.name: Sultan's Own
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sultan's Own''', also called the '''Jackals''', were a vicious organized military force located in the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].
document_data.Organization: This light infantry unit was a formation of 4,000 [[salamander]]s.
document_data.Activities: These security troops were infamous for their sadistic nature. They were used to violently quell unrest or riots among the poor citizens of the city when the [[Illuminated]] were not successful.
document_data.Base of Operations: The City of Brass served as the base of the Sultan's Own, specifically the [[Krak al-Tawil|Long Castle]] within [[Ashlarks]].
